attributes.action: Send medical supplies particularly oxygen to India
attributes.additional_details: Given the close links between the UK and India, the UK should step in to support India during this time of humanitarian crisis.
attributes.background: Given the on-going COVID-19 crisis in India resulting in the shortage of medical supplies particularly oxygen, an emergency debate should be arranged in the House of Commons so that MPs can discuss what emergency aid should be immediately sent to India

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase support for India in the Covid Crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584152

Send excess equipment to countries in humanitarian covid crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584188

Once priority groups in the UK are vaccinated redirect Covid-19 vaccines abroad: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572802

You may be interested to know that on 25 April the Government announced that it was sending medical equipment to India to support the country in its fight against COVID-19: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/uk-sends-life-saving-medical-equipment-to-india
